message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and square!
I'll give you 40, you can have 60, it's a good deal!
I'll take 42, you can have 58, a fair compromise!
I'll give you a small share, but I need 70 to make it worth it!
I'll take 45, you can have 55, it's my final offer!
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share!
Last chance, I'll take 48, you can have 52!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a tiny share!
Take it or leave it, I'm not going any lower!
I'm taking most of it, you're getting scraps!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm taking almost all of it, you're getting nothing!
I have no choice, I accept your offer.
